policies.title: Privacy Policy
paragraphs: Immigrate to Brazil processes personal data to answer inquiries, evaluate immigration eligibility, deliver contracted advisory services, and comply with legal obligations in Brazil and other relevant jurisdictions.

We may collect identity details, contact information, communication records, immigration profile information, billing records, and technical data such as IP address and browser details when you use this website.

Data is used under one or more lawful bases, including contract performance, pre-contractual steps requested by you, legitimate interest, consent where required, and compliance with legal obligations.

Personal data is retained only for as long as necessary for service delivery, legal compliance, dispute resolution, and audit integrity. Retention periods vary by case category and regulatory requirements.

You may request access, correction, deletion, portability, objection, or restriction of processing, subject to applicable law. Requests can be sent through the contact channels listed on the Contact page.
We implement administrative, contractual, and technical safeguards designed to protect personal data; however, no internet-based transmission or storage system can be guaranteed as absolutely secure.

policies.title: Terms of Service
paragraphs: By accessing this website, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, you should discontinue use of the website and any digital materials provided through it.
Website information is provided for general informational purposes and does not create attorney-client representation, legal mandate, or formal engagement unless confirmed by signed agreement.
You are responsible for the accuracy and completeness of information submitted through forms, consultations, or onboarding workflows. Inaccurate submissions may affect service quality and outcomes.
Fees, scope, and delivery timelines are governed by the applicable client agreement. Unless explicitly stated in writing, publishing timelines and authority response times are estimates only.
To the maximum extent permitted by law, liability for indirect, consequential, and incidental losses is excluded. Total liability is limited to fees paid for the relevant contracted service.
These terms are interpreted under applicable Brazilian law, without prejudice to mandatory consumer protections that may apply based on your residence and transaction context.

policies.title: Cookies Policy
paragraphs: This website uses cookies and similar technologies to ensure core functionality, understand usage behavior, improve user experience, and measure campaign performance.

Essential cookies are required for core service operation and cannot be disabled without affecting website stability. Analytics and marketing cookies are optional and managed by your consent settings where required.
Third-party tools, including analytics and tag management providers, may place cookies according to their own technical configuration and privacy notices.
You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings or any consent controls presented on the website. Blocking certain cookies may reduce website functionality.
Cookie retention periods vary by category and provider. Session cookies expire when your browsing session ends; persistent cookies remain until expiration or manual deletion.
We may update this policy to reflect legal, technical, or operational changes. Updated versions take effect when published on this page.

policies.title: Data Protection Notice
paragraphs: For users located in the EEA, UK, or other regions with similar data protection laws, we apply rights and controls consistent with applicable data protection requirements.
You may request access, rectification, erasure, portability, objection, and restriction of processing. You may also withdraw consent for consent-based processing at any time.
Cross-border data transfers, when required, are managed through appropriate safeguards such as contractual protections and processor due diligence.
If you believe your rights were not respected, you may contact us first so we can resolve the matter quickly, and you may also file a complaint with the relevant supervisory authority.
Data processors used for hosting, analytics, CRM, and operations are selected based on security posture and contractual commitments to confidentiality and lawful processing.
This notice supplements, and should be read together with, the main Privacy Policy and service-specific contractual documents.

policies.title: Refund Policy
paragraphs: Refund eligibility depends on the stage of service delivery, work already performed, and the specific contract terms accepted at onboarding.
Consultation sessions, diagnostic reviews, and custom strategy documents are generally non-refundable once delivered, because they involve reserved expert capacity and completed work product.
For ongoing service packages, partial refunds may be considered for unperformed portions where contract terms allow and where legal/administrative costs have not already been incurred.
Refund requests must be submitted in writing through official contact channels with your full name, service reference, payment proof, and reason for request.
Approved refunds are processed through the original payment rail where feasible and may require standard banking or payment-provider processing time.
Nothing in this policy limits mandatory consumer rights that cannot be waived under applicable law.

policies.title: Legal Disclaimers
paragraphs: Website materials are educational and operational in nature and do not constitute individualized legal advice unless provided under a formal signed engagement.
Immigration outcomes depend on facts, documentation quality, authority discretion, and evolving regulations. Past approvals do not guarantee future decisions.
Estimated timelines, costs, and procedural steps are planning references and may change due to government updates, workload, or jurisdiction-specific practice.
External links are provided for convenience. We are not responsible for third-party content, uptime, data practices, or legal statements on external websites.
Users remain responsible for verifying final submission documents and declarations before filing with authorities.
By using this website, you acknowledge these limitations and agree to seek personalized professional advice when needed for high-stakes legal decisions.
